document.full_text: with illinois facing a growing pile of bills from medicaid providers that is adding to its fiscal woes, the state's finance authority board on tuesday gave preliminary approval to a program to speed up payments.
document.title: illinois agency oks program to pay medicaid bills
lines_and_colors: with illinois facing a growing pile of bills from medicaid providers that is adding to its fiscal woes, the state's finance authority board on tuesday gave preliminary approval to a program to speed up payments.
